original_text: So be careful to obey him. Do everything that I tell you. Then I will be the enemy of your enemies. I will fight against anyone who fights against you.
korean_text: 네가 그의 목소리를 잘 청종하고 내 모든 말대로 행하면 내가 네 원수에게 원수가 되고 네 대적에게 대적이 될지라

sentences.original_text: So be careful to obey him.
Do everything that I tell you.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너에게 말하는 모든 것을 행하라.

sentences.original_text: Then I will be the enemy of your enemies.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하면 내가 네 원수들의 원수가 되리라.

sentences.original_text: I will fight against anyone who fights against you.
